description.value:
You've mastered travel within a specific type of terrain. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Favored Terrain] feat.

When in your favored terrain, you gain a +10-foot circumstance bonus to your travel Speed. When other creatures @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Follow the Expert] with you as a guide in your favored terrain, they gain both the ability to ignore non-magical difficult terrain for the purpose of their travel Speed and the bonus to travel Speed.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.JournalEntry.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.M5QOocGyP4zkMo9m]{Horizon Walker} archetype.
